caption: The image is a colorful illustration of a woman and a child walking together, possibly celebrating Mother's Day. The woman is wearing a red dress, and the child is holding her hand. The scene is set against a pink background, with a few pink flowers scattered throughout the image. The text in the image reads "happy mothers day to all mommies in the whole world."
texts:
to all mommies in 
thewhole world
